name: Quinoa and Black Bean Salad
short_description: A refreshing and protein-packed salad with quinoa, black beans, and vibrant vegetables.
long_description: Quinoa and Black Bean Salad is a nutritious and refreshing dish featuring a medley of quinoa, black beans, corn, tomatoes, and cilantro. The salad is dressed with a zesty lime and cumin vinaigrette.
ingredients: 1 can Black beans, drained and rinsed
instructions: Cook quinoa and let it cool.
Mix with black beans, corn, diced tomatoes, lime juice, cumin, olive oil, and chopped cilantro.
